title.rendered: “IDF’s Intense 24-Hour Operation: Over 150 Targets Hit, Terrorist Funds Seized in Gaza Strip”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF has struck over 150 terror targets in the Gaza Strip from the air, sea, and land in the past day.

Soldiers from the multidimensional unit, under the command of the brigade combat team 551, located in the home of a senior Hamas official in the Jebalia area, a suitcase of terrorist money worth around 5,000,000 NIS, and many weapons.

The brigade combat team 646 attacked a terrorist infrastructure yesterday, where many warfighting resources were found, including explosives, warfare equipment, and weapons of the type RPG. Additionally, in that same terrorist infrastructure, a cellar was found containing a stockpile of missiles and ammunition. The forces also located and destroyed launching pits and holes in the area.

An aircraft of the Air Force spotted a suspicious cell entering a Hamas terrorist infrastructure in the area of Khan Yunis. The combat team from the Givati Brigade directed an Air Force combat helicopter that attacked and eliminated the cell.

During the activity of the brigade combat team 4 yesterday in Khan Yunis area, the forces identified a sniper located in a building who was threatening the forces. The forces directed an aircraft of the Air Force and killed the terrorist.

In the past day, the Naval force attacked terrorist targets of the Hamas organization and assisted their ground forces in their activities on the Gaza Strip’s shores.

Attached is a picture of the terrorist money that was seized by the multi-dimensional unit soldiers: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC17122023.5417

Attached is footage from the forces’ activities in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/4814UUi

Attached is footage from the attacks in the past day in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/4821aC3

Attached are photos from the forces’ activities in the Gaza Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC18122023POIUYTREW

Attached are photos of the resources found by the brigade combat team 646: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC18122023LKJHGFDSA
